description: Docker Metrics with influx and Telegraf

targets.query: SELECT sum("n_containers_stopped") FROM "docker" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT sum("n_containers_stopped") FROM "docker" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT sum("n_containers_stopped") FROM "docker" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT last("free") / 1024000000  FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT last("used_percent") FROM "swap"  WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("used_percent") FROM "swap"  WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("used_percent") FROM "swap"  WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("used_percent") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("usage_idle") * -1 + 100 FROM "cpu" WHERE  ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("used_percent") FROM "mem" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("usage_idle") * -1 + 100 FROM "cpu" WHERE  ("host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_percent") FROM "docker_container_cpu" WHERE ("docker.group" =~ /^$Docker_Stack$/ AND "host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "container_name" fill(none)
SELECT mean("usage_percent") FROM "docker_container_cpu" WHERE ("docker.group" =~ /^$Docker_Stack$/ AND "host" =~ /^$Host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "container_name" fill(none)
